definition: sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: One of the most powerful cancer-promoting food ingredients of all is called sodium nitrate.
sentences.chinese: 最能致癌的食品成份之一就是硝酸钠。

sentences.english: What is the safe dose of sodium nitrite ?
sentences.chinese: 什么是安全剂量的亚硝酸钠？

sentences.english: It shows that the oxygenation of the sodium nitrate is obvious to cerium.
sentences.chinese: 研究结果证明，硝酸钠对铈的氧化作用是显著的。

sentences.english: AIM To study the sodium nitrite induced DNA mutation by convolution spectrometry (CS).
sentences.chinese: 目的采用褶合光谱法考察亚硝酸钠致DNA突变。

sentences.english: The polymerization of acrylonitrile in aqueous nitric acid solution with sodium nitrite as initiator has been studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了亚硝酸钠引发硝酸溶液中丙烯腈的聚合反应。

sentences.english: Alkyl halides are reacted with sodium nitrite .
sentences.chinese: 卤化烷与亚硝酸钠反应。

sentences.english: A zinc series phosphating solution was developed by using sodium nitrite as accelerant.
sentences.chinese: 研制出一种以亚硝酸钠为促进剂的室温磷化液。

sentences.english: Objective: To observe morphological changes of Trichophytosis rubrum treated by sodium nitrite.
sentences.chinese: 观察红色毛癣菌在亚硝酸钠作用下形态学变化。

sentences.english: This essay introduces a way of preparing sodium nitrate from brine by ion ex-change technology.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了用离子交换从卤水中制取硝酸钠的方法。

sentences.english: The results showed that the boiling point of brine with sodium nitrate would be reduced when the pressure was reduced.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，压力降低，含硝酸钠卤水的沸点也降低。
